/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the surroundings. The sky is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it. Power lines crisscross the sky, adding a touch of urbanity to the otherwise natural landscape.

On either side of the street, trees stand tall, their leaves a vibrant green. They line the street, providing a canopy of shade and adding a touch of nature to the cityscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city.

The street itself is devoid of any human presence, adding a sense of tranquility to the scene. A few cars are parked on the side of the road, hinting at the life that exists just out of frame. Despite the absence of people, the image is full of life, each element telling a story of a city that is both bustling and peaceful.
